message: Hello again. Have you spoken to Guthbered in the Prim main hall yet?

replies.text: No, not yet. Where can I find him?
Yes, he told me the story about Prim.
No, and I do not intend to speak to him either. I am on an urgent mission to help the Blackwater mountain settlement.

message: You there! Please you have to help us!

replies.text: What is the matter?
Is this the Blackwater mountain settlement?
Sorry, I cannot be bothered right now. I was told to go east quickly.

message: Blackwater? No no, certainly not. Just over there is the village of Prim.

replies.text: N

message: Blackwater mountain, those vicious bastards.

replies.text: N

message: East? But that leads up to Blackwater mountain.

replies.text: N

message: You really do not want to go up there.

replies.text: N

message: We desperately need help from someone from the outside in our village of Prim.

replies.text: N

message: You should speak to Guthbered, in the Prim main hall, just north of here.

replies.text: Ok, I will go see him.
I was told to go directly east.

message: Good, thanks. We really need your help!
The village of Prim is just north of here. You can probably see it through the trees over there.

replies.text: Ok, I will go there right away.

message: Do not listen to their lies!
Stay away. This is my hiding spot.

replies.text: What are you hiding from?
Who are you?

message: Claws, beasts, Gornauds. They cannot reach me here.

replies.text: 'Gornauds', is that what those monsters outside the village are called?
Yeah sure. Stay here and hide you pathetic creature.

message: Me? I am Moyra.

replies.text: Why are you hiding?

message: You are mean! I don't want to talk to you any more.
Please, not so loud! They could hear you.

replies.text: N

message: I have seen them on the path up the mountain. Sharpening their claws.

replies.text: N

message: I hide here now, so they cannot get to me.
Hello there. Welcome to Prim. Are you here to help us?

replies.text: Yes, I am here to help your village.
(Lie) Yes, I am here to help your village.

message: Thank you. We really need your help.

replies.text: N

message: You should speak to Guthbered if you haven't done so already.

replies.text: Will do, goodbye.
Where can I find him?

message: He is in the main hall right over there. The large stone house.
Hi, you seem to be new around here. How can I help you?

replies.text: Is there some place I can rest around here?
Where can I find a trader around here?

message: You should be able to find some place to rest in the inn right over there to the southeast.

replies.text: Thank you, goodbye.
Where can I find a trader around here?

message: Our armorer is in the house in the southwest corner. I should warn you that the supply is not what it used to be though.

replies.text: Thank you, goodbye.
Is there some place I can rest around here?

message: Hello. Welcome to Prim.
Hello. Who are you? Are you here to help us?

replies.text: I am looking for my brother. Would you by any chance have happened to see him around here?
Yes, I have come to help your village.
(Lie) Yes, I have come to help your village.

message: Your brother? Son, you should know that we do not get many visitors around here.

replies.text: N

message: So, no. I cannot help you.
Oh thank you. We could really use some help around here.
